name: Spooky Castle (itch) (cassettestudios)
description: This game was made by a group of friends for the University assignment. The game is a simple 2D, rougelike, dungeon crawler simmilar to Rogue Legacy. The game is made using Unity engine and C# as a scripting language, you can find source code on github https://github.com/RainbowDog98/Cassette-Studios. Feel free to copy, modify the code in any way or shape you want. If you enjoy our little game, feel free to donate, we would very much appreciate it :)
